SEARCH
Package nz.ac.wgtn.swen225.lc.app

Class GUI

java.lang.Object
nz.ac.wgtn.swen225.lc.app.GUI
public class GUI extends Object
This is the GUI object that creates the entirety of App GUI creates a JFrame that will contain all the game's components

  • Constructor Summary

    Creating the GUI class will create all the JPanel Components

  • Method Details

    • replayPane

      public void replayPane(Tile[][] Maze, Player player, int Time, int Level)
      A function for Recorder to send me parsed data to display for Replay functionality
      Parameters:
      Maze - is used to provide renderer with the current maze
      player - will give all the player's information at a given pane
      Time - will give the certain time Left of a given pane
      Level - will display the level of the replay

    • replay

      public void replay(int level)
      The code to replay the entire game based on the level choice
      Parameters:
      level - of the game that is to be replayed

    • moveChecker

      public void moveChecker(char key)
      A helper method used when character must move. Used to identify key game states like death and instructions
      Parameters:
      key - that has been pressed

    • loadFile

      public void loadFile()
      The method that will load the file, used for recorder This is used to bring up a saved state of the game.

    • writeFile

      public void writeFile()
      Used after Save functionality, menu Save or CTRL-S Will save all the actions made by the user

    • resetTimer

      public void resetTimer()
      Important method to create a new Timer and set behaviour The timer is a powerful object that is independent of any input or idle state

      Parameters:
      filename - used for retrieving ImageIcon
